resources.string: Are you sure you want to close? All progress will be lost.

The aim of this game is to form compounds or elements in the shortest amount of time with the least amount of mistakes. 
 
 - Drag an element on top of another element to form a compound. 
 
 - To turn a compound back into its reactants, double tap on it, and shake the phone. This may be irreversible in some instances… However you may reset to restore your elements and compounds to their original positions.
